attributes.title: Kundalini Awakening Is Not Brainwashing, It Is Heartwashing!
attributes.description:
Glimpses from Nithya Satsang with HDH Nithyananda Paramashivam

24 December 2019

POWERFUL COGNITIONS FROM TODAY’S NITHYANANDA (ENGLISH) SATSANG

*MESSAGE FROM PARAMASHIVA, SHRIKAILASA DIRECTLY IS ABOUT THE JNANA, PRAJNANA, VIJNANA OF SHAKTIPADA AND SHAKTINIPADA.

*UNDERSTAND THIS TRUTH. THIS IS EXTREMELY POWERFUL AND EXTRAORDINARILY POWERFUL. YOU WILL FEEL BLESSED FOR ATTENDING EVERYDAY’S SATSANG JUST BECAUSE OF ATTENDING TODAY’S SATSANG!

*THIS IS THE WHOLE SCIENCE OF SHAKTA, THE WHOLE SOURCE OF THE TRADITION, SYSTEM AND SAMPRADAYA OF SHAKTA. BASICALLY I AM A SHAKTA! I MAY TEACH SHAIVISM TO THE WHOLE WORLD, BUT I PERSONALLY ACHIEVED ALL THE GREAT THINGS FROM THE SHAKTA SAMPRADAYA!

*THIS IS THE SOURCE KNOWLEDGE, MOOLA JNANA, PRAJNANA, VIJNANA OF SHAKTA TRADITION. IT IS JNANA - PURE KNOWLEDGE FROM PARAMASHIVA JNANA MAPPED INTO OUR CONSCIOUSNESS IS PARAMASHIVA PRAJNANA AND MANIFESTED AS OUR REALITY IS PARAMASHIVA VIJNANA,.

*I AM GOING TO TEACH AND INITIATE ALL OF YOU INTO THE JNANA, PRAJNANA AND VIJNANA OF SHAKTIPADA AND SHAKTINIPADA.

*I AM DESCRIBING THE WHOLE SACRED SECRET AS IT IS. AT SOME TIME, MODERN DAY SCIENCE WILL CATCH UP WITH THIS SCIENCE I AM REVEALING.

*YOUR BIO ENERGY IS LEFT IN YOUR BODY WHEN YOU ASSUME THE BODY. IT IS LIKE A SNAKE, JOYFULLY ECSTATICALLY RESTING IN THE BODHA OF PARASHIVA - PARASHIVA SUKABODHA! IT HAPPILY GOES TO THE MULADHARA CHAKRA - THE ROOT OF SPINE AND RESTS IN PARAMASHIVA BODHA WITH SWEET MEMORIES CHERISHED. SHE JUST RESTS IN IT.

*ANYTIME BETWEEN THE AGE OF 0 - 3, THE NAGA MANI GETS EVOLVED IN THAT SNAKE. THE IDEA “I EXIST” WAKES UP IN YOUR BIO ENERGY DURING THE AGE 0-3, AND THAT IS CALLED PRAJNA! THE EARLIER IT HAPPENS, THE BETTER IT IS FOR YOU. THE BEING IS OF A HIGHER CONSCIOUSNESS WHEN IT IS EARLIER. PEOPLE WHO NEVER MISS THIS ARE THE INCARNATIONS. PEOPLE WHO GET THIS IN A FEW MONTHS ARE YOGA PRASHTAS. THEY WAKE UP TO THE REALITY “I EXIST” IN JUST ONE OR TWO MONTHS. THERE ARE MANY YOGA PRASHTA CHILDREN IN THE NITHYANANDA GURUKUL.

*THE KUNDALINI SNAKE GETS THE NAGA MANI, CALLED PRAJNA WHEN CONSCIOUSNESS IS FELT BY YOUR BIO ENERGY. THAT IS THE NAGA MANI OF THE KUNDALINI SNAKE. IN HINDU TRADITION, WE BELIEVE SNAKES HAVE A SPECIAL GEM ON THEIR FOREHEAD WHICH IS SELF EFFULGENT, SELF SHINING.

*NOT ONLY MYSTICALLY, MYTHOLOGICALLY, OR SYMBOLICALLY SNAKES GET THE NAGA MANI OF “I EXIST”, I HAVE SEEN THAT THE SNAKES IN TIRUCHENGODE HILL AND AREA DEVELOP THESE GEMS PHYSICALLY! I AM NOT DISRESPECTING ANY OTHER KSHETRA. BUT IN TIRUCHENGODE I HAVE SEEN SNAKES DEVELOPING THE NAGA MANI ON THEIR FOREHEAD.

*IF YOU ARE IN AND AROUND THE TIRUCHENGODE AREA, BUY THE ORIGINAL TURMERIC GROWN BY THE KAVERI WATER, MAKE IT AS A POWDER AND APPLY IT ON THE HUGE SNAKE ON THE HILL, TAKE IT AS A PRASADAM. THERE WILL BE TWO TYPES OF TURMERIC. ONE FOR INTERNAL USE, ANOTHER FOR EXTERNAL USE. TAKE IT AS PRASADAM, APPLY IT ON YOUR FACE AND BODY, AND IN YOUR FOOD. THAT SNAKE HAS SELF-EFFULGENT NAGAMANI INSIDE IT. THAT SNAKE IS THE LARGEST SCULPTURE IN THE WORLD. OF COURSE, IT IS NOT A SCULPTURE, IT IS SWAYAMBU! IT IS LIVING! I AM WITNESS AND I HAVE SEEN THE NAGAMANI ON ATLEAST 10 SNAKES.

*THE BREEZE BLOWING ON ARDHANEESHWARA CAN HEAL ANYTHING. THAT IS WHY THE WHOLE TIRUCHENGODE AREA IS SO SACRED. IN 1999, WHEN I NEEDED TO SETTLE IN THE BODY AFTER THE GREAT PAUSE I HAD, I WENT TO TIRUCHENGODE TO SETTLE DOWN. IT IS THE MOST AUSPICIOUS KSHETRA. THERE ARE TWO TYPES OF TURMERIC - ONE FOR EXTERNAL USE AND ANOTHER FOR INTERNAL PURPOSE. DO ABHISHEKAM TO THE NAGA RAJA, AND KEEP BOTH. USE SEPARATELY TO PUT IN YOUR COOKING AND APPLYING ON SKIN.

*THE FIRST EVOLUTION HAPPENS IN YOUR BIO ENERGY KUNDALINI SNAKE. IT IS ALMOST IN THE FORM OF A SNAKE, WHICH IS ALIVE FROM HEAD TO TOE. THE FEELING THAT YOU FEEL “I EXIST”, CALLED PRAJNA, DEVELOPS AS A SELF-EFFULGENT AND SHINING LIKE A GOLDEN DIAMOND ON THE THIRD EYE; FOREHEAD OF THAT SNAKE. YOUR BIO ENERGY IS LIKE A SNAKE IN GOLDEN COLOUR. THE PRAJNA “I EXIST” IS LIKE A GOLDEN DIAMOND ON THE THIRD EYE, FOREHEAD OF THE SNAKE OF THAT KUNDALINI SHAKTI.

*THE FIRST EVOLUTION HAPPENING TO YOUR BIO ENERGY - REPRESENTED AS THE SNAKE - IS WHEN THE SNAKE DEVELOPS THE NAGA MANI, WHEN THE PRAJNA “I EXIST’ STARTS BEING FELT BY YOU. WHENEVER YOU FEEL YOU EXIST, THAT WAKING UP BECOMES LIKE A SELF EFFULGENT YELLOW DIAMOND ON YOUR BIO ENERGY, KUNDALINI.
